ygData.subject: Dual Wield with long swords
ygData.msgSnippet: In a LONG fight using my FS 2H Sword and kick my sta will start to go down (sta = 110). In a LONG fight using my Combine LSword, a FS LSword, Bash and dual
ygData.messageBody:
In a LONG fight using my FS 2H Sword and kick my sta will start to go down
(sta = 110).

In a LONG fight using my Combine LSword, a FS LSword, Bash and dual wield my
sta NEVER, NEVER goes down.

To all those that use or want to use two mino axes I say - DON'T DO IT -
hehehe.

Also, when I get jumped by a creature that requires a magic weapon, all I
have to do is put away my FS LSword and equip my shield. If you have two
mino axes attacking a ghoul, you will only miss the ghoul twice as much.

Someday, when I get the cash and I have bought all banded armor, I will buy
a second combine long sword.

For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
